questions.text: Does the service provide encryption for data at rest?
questions.guidance: Look for information on default encryption standards.

questions.text: What components of the service are public by default?
questions.guidance: Any cloud resource that is publically accessible by default must have security controls in place to block unauthorized and annonymous access.

questions.text: Does the service provide encryption for data in transit?
questions.guidance: Data should only be transmitted over networks via an encrypted method, such as TLSv1.2 or higher.

questions.text: How would the service be operated in a global, financial service organization?
questions.guidance: Provide an overall listing of the security risks and their mitigating controls in a global, financial service organization.
